CompendiumTools.title: Arbron's Compendium Tools
CompendiumTools.bypassEditLock.name: Bypass Edit Lock
CompendiumTools.bypassEditLock.hint: Allows for editing Compendiums even when they are locked or belong to a module. Warning: Changes made to modules you do not control will be overwritten when the module is updated.
CompendiumTools.replace.title: Replace Entry
CompendiumTools.replace.typeMismatchWarn: You are trying to replace a {originalType} with a {replacementType}. Are you sure you would like to do this?
